pizzas.name: ACHARI DO PYAJA
pizzas.description: Tangy & spicy achari flavours on a super cheesy onion pizza- as desi as it gets!

pizzas.name: MOROCCAN SPICE PASTA PIZZA
pizzas.description: A pizza loaded with spicy combination of Harissa sauce and delicious pasta

pizzas.name: FRESH VEGGIE
pizzas.description: Delectable combination of onion & capsicum, a veggie lovers pick

pizzas.name: CHEESE N CORN
pizzas.description: Sweet & Juicy Golden corn and 100% real mozzarella cheese in a delectable combination!

pizzas.name: CREAMY TOMATO PASTA PIZZA
pizzas.description: Loaded with a delicious creamy tomato pasta topping, green capsicum, crunchy red and yellow bell peppers and black olives.

pizzas.name: CHOCOLATE & BANANA
pizzas.description: made with chocolate sauce and fresh sliced banana

pizzas.name: TOMATO & MUSHROOMS
pizzas.description: Combination of mushroom and tomato with creamy tomato sauce

pizzas.name: ROSEMARY POTATO MAKHNI PIZZA
pizzas.description: Pizza with Makhni sauce, rosemary potato and our fresh homemade mozzarella cheese.

pizzas.name: ITALIAN FRESH MEDLEY PIZZA
pizzas.description: Loaded with vibrant seasonal veggies and garnished with red bell pepper reduction and black olives.

pizzas.name: CHICKEN EXPLOSION PIZZA
pizzas.description: An overdose of chicken served in 3 different styles served with rosemary infused oil.

pizzas.name: BARBECUE CHICKEN PIZZA
pizzas.description: Finest recipe of flavorful barbecue chicken, just rightly cooked served in our house special san marzano tomato sauce.
